Job Description
Job Summary:

Scope of Position:

Works with business partners to determine data analysis, data visualization and data analytics tools needed to address a business need. Leverages resources to conduct non-routine statistical modeling and develops data analytics tools independently. Solves complex problems using in-depth knowledge and experience. Analyzes and interprets data in the context of existing knowledge and understanding of Global Production and makes business recommendations. May have direct reports.

Basic Function:

Works with all Global Production Groups to define and implement production analytics opportunities in response to specific requests. Develops and manages manufacturing analytics projects. Works with IT, Production Sites and external vendors to properly set up analytics environments and ensure appropriate data analytics are generated in production. Conducts statistical analysis and modeling and data visualization to answer short term / tactical as well as long term / strategic questions. Educates and builds best data practices around Global Production.

jd2
Job Responsibilities:

40% - Works with business partners to determine data analysis, data visualization and data analytics tools to address their needs. Understands the complexities of the business situation and designs the most appropriate data analytics approach. Draws on in-depth knowledge and experience.

20% - Conducts non-routine statistical modeling and develops complex analytics tools independently. Leverages resources to conduct routine statistical analysis, data visualization and to develop analytics tools. Solves complex problems using in-depth knowledge and experience.

20% - Analyzes and interprets data in the context of the existing body of knowledge. Communicates results to business partners and makes recommendations for next steps independently. Translates complex scientific ideas into business applicable recommended actions. and issues reports with minimum supervision.

20% - Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience. Leads project implementation internal to own function with no supervision. Leads external projects with minimal supervision.

jd3
